name: Drunk Puppet
description: Drunk Puppet is the most realistic walking simulator you'll be playing this year! Keep calm, because you are waiting for insurmountable difficulties, such as careless drivers and an inexplicable inability to step on the cracks on the sidewalk. You will laugh. You will cry.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: intel core 2 duo Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Intel hd 4600 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i9 Memory: 8000 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 2080ti DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 500 MB available space
